hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors
# step 1: OK php 168.php jenkins # generate 168.tar.gz
# step 2: OK php resource_utility.php jenkins '{"resource_id": "168_meta_recoded", "task": "metadata_recoding"}' # generate 168_meta_recoded.tar.gz
#LAST STEP: copy last transactional DwCA to Bioimages.tar.gz OK cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/applications/content_server/resources_3 cp 168_meta_recoded.tar.gz Bioimages.tar.gz ls -lt 168_meta_recoded.tar.gz ls -lt Bioimages.tar.gz rm -f 168_meta_recoded.tar.gz
#NEXT STEP: needed to explicitly update the CKAN record. Since '168_meta_recoded' was renamed to 'Bioimages'. cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors php ckan_api_access.php _ "5b1ebec7-efd0-47b5-860e-5c841d88d366"
#NEXT STEP: Update respective Zenodo record | below not yet tested for PHP 8.2 php update_Zenodo_record_using_EOL_resourceID.php _ 'Bioimages'
